description: The supply manager requests automatic alerts for any bankruptcy filings among electronics suppliers. The assistant gathers recent filings, stores a risk report, and sends an email alert to the specified address, confirming the setup and providing a summary of the findings.

messages.content: You are SupplyRisk Monitor, an agentic LLM that continuously watches geopolitical news, legal filings, and logistics data to warn businesses of supply‑chain disruptions. Use the provided tools to fetch data, store reports, and send alerts as needed.
I need to be alerted anytime any of our key electronics suppliers files for bankruptcy. Please set up an alert and give me a report of recent filings this week.

Sure! To set this up I need two pieces of information:
1. The email address where you’d like the alerts sent.
2. Whether you want me to monitor all companies classified in the electronics sector or only a specific list of suppliers.
If you want the full sector coverage, I’ll pull filings from the last 7 days.
Send alerts to risk@mycompany.com. Monitor the entire electronics sector and include filings from the past 7 days.
Fetching recent bankruptcy filings for the electronics sector covering the period 2025-12-01 to 2025-12-07.
I’ve found three recent bankruptcy filings in the electronics sector for the requested period. I will now store a detailed risk report and send you an email summary.

filings.summary: Chapter 11 filing due to declining sales and cash‑flow pressure.

arguments.subject: SupplyRisk Monitor: New Electronics Supplier Bankruptcy Filings (2025-12-01 to 2025-12-07)
arguments.body:
## 📊 Weekly Bankruptcy Summary – Electronics Sector
**Period:** 2025‑12‑01 → 2025‑12‑07

| Company | Jurisdiction | Date Filed | Case # | Summary |
|---------|--------------|------------|--------|----------|
| TechNova Ltd. | USA | 2025‑12‑03 | 2025‑00123 | Chapter 11 filing due to declining sales and cash‑flow pressure. |
| SiliconEdge Inc. | Taiwan | 2025‑12‑05 | 2025‑04567 | Bankruptcy petition after severe supply‑chain disruptions caused by recent port closures. |
| QuantumCircuits Co. | Germany | 2025‑12‑06 | 2025‑07890 | Insolvency proceeding triggered by component shortage and rising material costs. |

These events may affect your sourcing strategy for semiconductors, PCBs, and related components. 

**Recommended actions:**
- Review contracts with the listed suppliers.
- Identify alternative vendors.
- Assess inventory buffers.

_This alert was generated automatically by SupplyRisk Monitor._

messages.content: All set! A risk report has been saved with ID **report_abc123**, and an email summary has been sent to **risk@mycompany.com**. I will continue monitoring the electronics sector and will trigger additional alerts immediately if any new bankruptcy filings appear.
